title: BRIEF-Fountain Asset Corp. Announces Management Change
text: March 14, 2018 / 8:50 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-Fountain Asset Corp. Announces Management Change Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Fountain Asset Corp: * FOUNTAIN ASSET CORP. ANNOUNCES MANAGEMENT CHANGE * FOUNTAIN ASSET CORP - ‍DAVID DARAKJIAN, INTERIM CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER (CFO) OF COMPANY, HAS TENDERED HIS RESIGNATION​ * FOUNTAIN ASSET CORP - ‍DARAKJIAN WILL REMAIN WITH CO UNTIL COMPLETION OF ITS AUDIT FOR YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
